title: FPS problems since newest update
body: I had the initial problem of getting a black launch screen. After a while something happened and said there was an update. Updated. Now I can play , but only at 1FPS. Tips on fixing?

replies.body: Generally, black screen are caused by network issues that can't download assets or connect to the game server.  I recommend going through the steps of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to prevent that from happening again.  When you say 1 fps are you referring to your actual screen or how long it takes for you to see your input in game?  Let me know, as that may be a separate issue.
